channel.title: How many people like Fallout 3 here?
channel.description: Well, I don't know whether to post my work so far or what. I've been working on an mmorpg using Runescape bases, To Try and make it like fallout 3. So far I've got trade caravans and perks and different skills rather than mining, such as barter. How many of you would think that would be cool. Those of you who play or played fallout 3? Thanks I would really like some feedback, post a comment or contact me at Iceapoo@live.com (email & MSN)

item.title: How many people like Fallout 3 here?

I love fallout 3, but please don’t even try.

Read full topic
